items.title: Meta staffers reportedly furious after Mark Zuckerberg’s hate speech update allows ‘allegations of mental illness’ based on gender or sexual orientation
items.description: Staffers say Meta is in "total chaos" following the changes announced by CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

items.title: Can Carlyle catch up? Storied PE firm tries to reclaim its former glory
items.description: Can Carlyle catch up? Storied PE firm tries to reclaim its former glory

items.title: Elon Musk aims to reignite Tesla’s fading momentum by making Model Y look like the Cybercab
items.description: Much is riding on the refreshed Model Y, slated to launch in March. The six-year-old crossover accounts for two out of every three Teslas sold.

items.title: Ryanair is suing a passenger who was so disruptive on a flight he forced the plane to land over 1,000 miles away from its destination
items.description: Ryanair is seeking damages after it needed to pay for hotel accommodations and other expenses for 160 passengers.

items.title: Man arrested for arson by LAPD at site of major Californian fire
items.description: Los Angeles district attorney Nathan Hochman has vowed to come down hard on anyone found guilty of arson.
